lexUnit.name: annoying.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of anger and frustration

sentence.text: ` Laura found the new formalities extremely annoying .
The most annoying fact was that it could and should have been a masterpiece .
` One of the most annoying things about getting kicked out is that I never once got a single warning , " he says .
` His most annoying habit was burping .
The most common problem arises from that annoying characteristic of British weather , the late spring frost .
I suppose the most annoying thing was that I could n't stop saying ` sorry " all the time .
As a long time drinker of real ale , who has only joined CAMRA in the last year , I found this belly-aching very annoying .
Endill found it funny but someone sitting next to him said it became very annoying year after year .
If that was true , it was really annoying ; a professional contact should take time to find out all the likely addresses for the assassin to check .
CELLULOID RECORDS was one of those insanely annoying New York labels where everyone seemed to be making records based on weird theories and somehow all the records were great .
CLIFF Richard is intensely annoying .
If people who promise to telephone or visit you fail to do so it is very annoying .
This situation is extremely annoying , though .
The reason I 'm here now is because of the train strike which is extremely annoying .
He was the most annoying man .
It 's really annoying .
It 's a bit annoying .
Some annoying habits , like jumping up , can be reversed .
Moreover , autofocus lenses have the annoying habit of frequently being confused by the aquarium glass , resulting in out of focus photographs .
These work fine expect for one annoying problem which I can not seem to eliminate .
Now , however , it seems to have developed an annoying problem .
Is there any way to increase the buffer used by Print Manager or any other way to stop this annoying problem ?
He seems to assume I 'm about as liberal-minded as Genghis Khan and the annoying thing is , when he talks to me , I start sounding like the worst sort of reactionary .
The annoying thing was that the revolting youth had put his finger on a significant point .
The peace in the harbour area was undisturbed , except for the insistent and mildly annoying buzz of flies .
After such victory , an annoying revelation was that the starting point was crammed with hatchbacks , unquestionably owned by people who would never share my trepidation .
` I wish writers would not write such annoying letters to me .
There are two pockets on each side with those annoying bottom-to-top zippers and a full length main zip covered with a small stormflap .
There is inevitably a problem with continuity as well as some mildly annoying repetition , but such is the nature of collected studies written so far apart in time .
They 're just annoying strips of nylon that flap in the breeze .
And yet it seemed her annoying presence somehow energised him .
Isabel decided to ignore this annoying example of male arrogance .
Cornelius found the habit mildly annoying , but as he prided himself that he could get through any interview with Mr Yarrow without uttering a single word , he refrained from comment .
Badly hosted by Paul Dempsey , the satellite programme hardly hides its bias towards the capital 's clubs -- and it is becoming increasingly annoying .
